import React,{useState}from'react';import{AuthProvider,useAuth}from'./contexts/AuthContext';import LoginPage from'./components/LoginPage';import Header from'./components/Header';import Sidebar from'./components/Sidebar';import HomePage from'./components/HomePage';import TaskPage from'./components/TaskPage';import QuizPage from'./components/QuizPage';import ProgressPage from'./components/ProgressPage';import HandbookPage from'./components/HandbookPage';import PlaceholderPage from'./components/PlaceholderPage';import ReportPage from'./components/ReportPage';import CertificatePage from'./components/CertificatePage';import CourseManagementPage from'./components/CourseManagementPage';import QuizManagementPage from'./components/QuizManagementPage';// 主应用内容组件
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppContent=()=>{const{isAuthenticated,isLoading,login}=useAuth();const[activeMenu,setActiveMenu]=useState('home');// 如果正在加载，显示加载状态
if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"\u6B63\u5728\u52A0\u8F7D..."})]})});}// 如果未登录，显示登录页面
if(!isAuthenticated()){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{onLogin:login});}const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeMenu){case'home':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HandbookPage,{});case'tasks':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskPage,{});case'quiz':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizPage,{});case'retry':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlaceholderPage,{title:"\u9519\u9898\u91CD\u505A",description:"\u91CD\u65B0\u7EC3\u4E60\u4E4B\u524D\u505A\u9519\u7684\u9898\u76EE"});case'progress':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgressPage,{});case'course-management':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseManagementPage,{});case'report':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReportPage,{});case'certificate':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CertificatePage,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex h-[calc(100vh-80px)]",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{activeMenu:activeMenu,onMenuChange:setActiveMenu}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"flex-1 overflow-y-auto bg-white",children:renderContent()})]})]});};function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContent,{})});}export default App;
